FuncDef: The display bfd session verbose command displays detailed information about BFD sessions. The display bfd session verbose command displays detailed information about BFD sessions.
CLIs: display bfd session all [ for-ip | for-srv6-segment-list ] verbose
display bfd session passive-dynamic [ peer-ip <peer-ip> remote-discriminator <discr-value> ] verbose
display bfd session peer-ip { <peer-ip> [ vpn-instance <vpn-name> ] | default-ip } verbose

ParaDef.Info:
Displays detailed information about the BFD session for detecting faults in IP links.
-

Displays detailed information about all BFD sessions.
-

Displays detailed information about all static BFD sessions.
-

Displays detailed information about the BFD sessions that are passively created.
-

Displays detailed information about the BFD session with a specified peer IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Displays detailed information about a BFD session with a specified remote discriminator.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Displays detailed information about dynamic and statically self-negotiated BFD sessions.
-

Displays detailed information about a BFD session with a specified local discriminator.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Displays detailed information about the BFD session bound to a specified VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Displays statistics about BFD sessions with the default multicast address.
-

Displays detailed information about static BFD sessions with automatically negotiated discriminators.
-

ExtraInfo: To view detailed information about BFD sessions, run the display bfd session verbose command with one or more parameters.
